p: Data entry was facilitated using EpiData 3.1 software (EpiData Association, Odense M, Denmark). Stata 13 (Stata Corporation, College Station, Texas, USA) was used to perform all statistical analysis. The demographic characteristics of health professionals were descriptively analysed. The relationship between demographic variables and perception variables was assessed using Chi square test, or Fisherâ€™s exact tests if expected cell frequencies were less than or equal to five [ 18, 29]. Results were considered statistically significant at a p value <0.05.
